$interpreted: Pang: Hmm... I guess I will set up camp here for the night...
Pang: However, there's still a problem that needs to be taken care with.
Puggi: ... So why don't you want friends is it some traumatic experience or do you think you are too cool to have friends...
Pang: Enough. Can't you be quiet for even a minute?
Puggi: Well~ because every time I ask you a question, you just ignore me. My only choice is to keep asking more questions, right?
Pang: If I answer just one of your questions, will you shut up and let me rest?
Puggi: Sure~ So, why don't you want friends?
Pang: I was once the bodyguard of royalty in the East Alliance. The person I was in charge of protecting was my only friend.
Pang: However, he later did something that put in me a very tough situation. After that, I swore to never make another friend again.
Puggi: ......
Puggi: And then?
Pang: That's it. Now go to sleep!
Puggi: Dude, come on~ Don't be such a jerk. Tell me more.
Pang: Hmm? Where did that annoying fluff ball go?
Pang: Did he get himself in trouble again?

Pang: Wait, why do I have to worry about him?
Better leave now.
Puggi: Pang~
Puggi: My fun sensors were tingling, so I decided to follow them and look what I found. A whole bunch of Matsutake mushrooms!

Pang: So that's where...
I thought something bad happened to you...
Puggi: Hmm? Could it be... that you are concerned about me...
Pang: No, you heard wrong.
Puggi: Is that so. Whatever, I brought your share as well. Here, take this.
Puggi: What's the matter?
Pang: ... Nothing. It's just... I haven't been gifted a present for a long time...
Puggi: Ah, right; since you took half of it, you are now my accomplice.

Menacing Bandit: You stinkin fowl!
Not only did you eat all the food in our storage,
Menacing Bandit: but you also stole the Matsutake mushrooms we are going to sell!
Barbaric Bandit: You are not leaving here in one piece! You will pay for what you did!
Pang: Sigh......
Puggi: Bunch of cowards, I dare you to come back! I'll beat you with one hand the next time!

Puggi: You were too easy on them.
You should've wrecked them so hard they couldn't move a muscle.

Pang: Their pride has already been damaged.
No need for such excessive punishments.
Puggi: Puhahaha~

Puggi: Did you say your punches hurt their pride?
Bro, that's hilarious!
Pang: I don't find that funny...
Puggi: Don't be so modest. Quick, tell me a few more jokes. I think I may have just found your first good trait.
Pang: I'm going to sleep.
Puggi: Aww~ don't be a party pooper. Tell me some more jokes!

Model.Text: Hmm... I guess I will set up camp here for the night...
However, there's still a problem that needs to be taken care with.
... So why don't you want friends is it some traumatic experience or do you think you are too cool to have friends...
Enough. Can't you be quiet for even a minute?
Well~ because every time I ask you a question, you just ignore me. My only choice is to keep asking more questions, right?
If I answer just one of your questions, will you shut up and let me rest?
Sure~ So, why don't you want friends?
I was once the bodyguard of royalty in the East Alliance. The person I was in charge of protecting was my only friend.
However, he later did something that put in me a very tough situation. After that, I swore to never make another friend again.
And then?
That's it. Now go to sleep!
Dude, come on~ Don't be such a jerk. Tell me more.
Hmm? Where did that annoying fluff ball go?
Did he get himself in trouble again?

Wait, why do I have to worry about him?
Better leave now.
Pang~
My fun sensors were tingling, so I decided to follow them and look what I found. A whole bunch of Matsutake mushrooms!

So that's where...
I thought something bad happened to you...
Hmm? Could it be... that you are concerned about me...
No, you heard wrong.
Is that so. Whatever, I brought your share as well. Here, take this.
What's the matter?
... Nothing. It's just... I haven't been gifted a present for a long time...
Ah, right; since you took half of it, you are now my accomplice.

You stinkin fowl!
Not only did you eat all the food in our storage,
but you also stole the Matsutake mushrooms we are going to sell!
You are not leaving here in one piece! You will pay for what you did!
Sigh......
Bunch of cowards, I dare you to come back! I'll beat you with one hand the next time!

You were too easy on them.
You should've wrecked them so hard they couldn't move a muscle.

Their pride has already been damaged.
No need for such excessive punishments.
Puhahaha~

Did you say your punches hurt their pride?
Bro, that's hilarious!
I don't find that funny...
Don't be so modest. Quick, tell me a few more jokes. I think I may have just found your first good trait.
I'm going to sleep.
Aww~ don't be a party pooper. Tell me some more jokes!
